Name: Shadow of Asha
About the game: The village of Narkian is being attacked and corrupted by Asha. Great warriors tried to defeat her, but all failed. The residents of the village are moving out as they do not believe there is hope. However, there is still a chance for the village. Narkin, grandson of Narkian, a great warrior, has the arduous task of facing Asha's darkness and imprisoning her, as her grandfather did in the past.
Meta Title: Shadow of Asha: Jun 9, 2022, Pyliot and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Shadow of Asha? Check out the release date (Jun 9, 2022), developer insights from Pyliot, and a complete game summary.
